subtasks: Guiding the combine along the rows of grain
Adjusting the combine’s height to harvest crops without damaging plants
Monitoring grain flow through the combine's auger
Verifying the swath width and distribution of cut crops
Checking the header’s sharpness and adjustment for efficient cutting
Engaging the combine's threshing cylinder as needed

tasks.task: Applying fertilizer via an aerial spray tanker
subtasks: Loading the spray tanker with liquid fertilizer
Flying the tanker in a steady, even flight path over the crop
Adjusting spray nozzle settings for optimal coverage
Monitoring the pressure and flow rates during operation

tasks.task: Mowing and baling hay with a self-propelled mower-conditioner
subtasks: Positioning the conditioner to cut hay at the correct height
Adjusting the belt width for proper straw management
Ensuring the bale chamber is functioning properly to form uniform bales
Operating the hydraulic lift to place bales onto the wagon
Towing the bale wagon to designated storage areas

tasks.task: Planting seeds using a grain drill
subtasks: Setting the drill depth and seed spacing according to crop requirements
Ensuring proper seed coverage and adjustment of the press wheels
Monitoring ground speed to maintain planting efficiency
Verifying seed moisture content and adjusting if necessary

tasks.task: Checking soil moisture using a water test
subtasks: Digging a small hole in the soil to observe moisture level
Comparing soil texture and appearance to determine moisture content
Determining if soil is too wet or dry for planting

tasks.task: Harvesting cotton with a picker unit
subtasks: Navigating the picker through rows of cotton plants
Adjusting the basket height to capture cotton without damaging plants
Verifying the picker teeth are clean and effective
Inspecting the pickup chain for proper operation
Feeding harvested crops into the separator
Monitoring grain screens and adjusting if necessary
Ensuring elevator is running smoothly to remove grain
Oil changes and regular maintenance checks on the separator

tasks.task: Applying seed treatment with a fertigun
subtasks: Loading the fertigun with seed treatment solution
Walking behind the grain drill, applying solution as seeds are planted
Ensuring correct mixing of the treatment with seeds
Activating the irrigation system to water crops
Regulating water pressure and flow rate for efficient use
Checking for any leaks or malfunctions in the system
Monitoring weather conditions to adjust watering schedule
Mixing pesticide in the tanker’s onboard solution tank
Conducting scout flights to identify pest areas
Flying over fields to apply pesticide accurately
Calculating required pesticide volumes and coverage area

tasks.task: Checking field for compaction using tire pressure gauge
subtasks: Measuring tire pressure of farm equipment
Determining appropriate adjustments to reduce soil compaction
Noting locations requiring air pressure adjustments

tasks.task: Adjusting irrigator arm angle on center pivot system
subtasks: Locating the pivot controller and irrigation arms
Measuring the angle and direction needed for irrigation
Using hydraulic controls to reposition the irrigation arm
Herding animals from one field to another
Ensuring fences and gates are secure for the animals
Observing animal behavior to ensure they are adjusting to new environment

tasks.task: Conducting soil pH test using a hand-held meter
subtasks: Collecting soil sample in a core soil probe
Testing the sample with the pH meter and recording results
Determining required amendments based on test

tasks.task: Identifying plants by pulling a small shoot from the field
subtasks: Observing plant leaves, stem characteristics, and overall growth
Comparing to reference materials or online resources
